title: "China Lags Behind in Corporate AI Adoption"
excerpt: "China, widely perceived as a global leader in artificial intelligence, doesn’t measure up to the U.S. and several other countries when it comes to an important component of AI strategy—adoption by businesses that aren’t startups—a new study found."
